TopicTitle: Does Tiberdine Shuttle Docking port are compatinle to clamp o tron docking port?

Articles.Content: I want to dock shuttle to space station that i designed earlier
I believe they are, give it a try!

Tiberdine Shuttle is Sucks and so on MechJeb2, when i launched shuttle using MechJeb 2 i set target, but the MechJeb put me on wrong inclination, i aligned the orbit, make approach and using the mechjeb 2 to dock, RCS fuel was run out, while i have 15,5 m from docking port

i'm very pissed off

Tiberdine Shuttle is Sucks and so on MechJeb2, when i launched shuttle using MechJeb 2 i set target, but the MechJeb put me on wrong inclination

I haven't tried it in Mechjeb 2 but in Mechjeb 1 the problem is that mechjeb assumes that the direction the cockpit is pointing is forwards. A reasonable assumption most of the time but it does mean it can't fly stuff like the shuttle with it's offset engines.

I noticed that MechJeb 2 send my to orbit inclination 15 despite i set it to 0.

I think it's not mechjeb 2 fault but Shuttle itself.

I noticed that MechJeb 2 send my to orbit inclination 15 despite i set it to 0.

I think it's not mechjeb 2 fault but Shuttle itself.

It's sucks shuttle docking port doesn't fit to clamp o tron:(, i think i just stick with regular Mk1-2 Command Pod, it easier to control.

It's sucks shuttle docking port doesn't fit to clamp o tron:(, i think i just stick with regular Mk1-2 Command Pod, it easier to control.

False. Shuttle docking ports do fit to Clamp-o-Tron, it just depends on which type.
